trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration to print out the names and colors of all its values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>列舉型別以列印出的名稱和其所有的值的色彩。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: Create a form and paste the following code into it.
trans-unit.target: 建立表單，並貼上下列程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Call the `DisplayKnownColors` method in the form's `Paint` event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`DisplayKnownColors`方法在表單的`Paint`事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 現用視窗之框線的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the background of the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 現用視窗標題列之背景的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the text in the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 現用視窗標題列中文字的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the application workspace.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式工作區的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式工作區是多重文件檢視中沒有被文件佔領的區域。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 3D 項目的系統定義表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 系統定義的色彩，其為 3D 項目的反白色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
trans-unit.target: 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 系統定義的色彩，其為 3D 項目的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
trans-unit.target: 這個色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 3D 項目的系統定義表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 3D 項目的系統定義陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: The shadow color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
trans-unit.target: 陰影色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 系統定義的色彩，其為 3D 項目的深色陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: The dark shadow color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the darkest color.
trans-unit.target: 深色陰影色彩會套用至色彩最深的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color that is the light color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 系統定義的色彩，其為 3D 項目的淺色色彩。

trans-unit.source: The light color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
trans-unit.target: 淺色色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 3D 項目的系統定義反白色彩。

trans-unit.source: The highlight color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the lightest color.
trans-unit.target: 反白色彩會套用至色彩最亮的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of text in a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 3D 項目中文字的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the desktop.
The system-defined color of the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 在現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中，最亮色彩的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 在非現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中，最亮色彩的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: 暗灰色之 (Dimmed) 文字的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: Items in a list that are disabled are displayed in dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: 清單中停用的項目會以暗灰色的文字來顯示。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the background of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 選取項目之背景的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: This includes selected menu items as well as selected text.
trans-unit.target: 這包含選取的功能表項目以及選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the text of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 選取項目之文字的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
trans-unit.target: 系統定義的色彩，其用於指定熱點追蹤的項目。

trans-unit.source: Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
trans-unit.target: 按一下熱點追蹤的項目會執行該項目。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of an inactive window's border.
trans-unit.target: 非現用視窗之框線的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 非現用視窗標題列之背景的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 非現用視窗標題列中文字的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the background of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示之背景的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the text of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示之文字的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of a menu's background.
trans-unit.target: 功能表之背景的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the background of a menu bar.
trans-unit.target: 功能表列之背景的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
trans-unit.target: 當功能表顯示為平面功能表時，用於反白顯示功能表項目的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of a menu's text.
trans-unit.target: 功能表之文字的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the background of a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 捲軸之背景的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the background in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 視窗工作區 (Client Area) 中背景的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of a window frame.
trans-unit.target: 視窗框架的系統定義色彩。

trans-unit.source: The system-defined color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 視窗工作區中文字的系統定義色彩。
